00013 #define DIGIT_FORMAT(digit) std::setw(digit) << std::setfill('0')
00014 #define STR_FORMAT(digit) std::left << std::setw(digit)

00020                 "ERROR  ", "REWRITE" };

00044 void Logger::common(LogLevel l, char* format, va_list args) {
00045 
00046         struct timeval time;
00047         struct timezone tz;
00048 
00049         gettimeofday(&time, &tz);
00050 
00051         char buf[2048];
00052         vsnprintf(buf, 2048, format, args);
00053         std::string body = m_className + ": ";
00054         body.append(buf);
00055 
00056         std::string log_string = formatTime(time) + " " + pid(mt::System::getPid(),
00057                         mt::System::getTid()) + " [" + levelVals[l] + "] " + body;
00058 
00059         AutoMutex a(m_clctrMtx);
00060         if (m_collector) {
00061                 m_collector->push(log_string);
00062         }
00063 
00064 }
00065 
00066 std::string Logger::formatTime(const struct timeval& time) {
00067 
00068         struct tm *local_tm = localtime(&time.tv_sec);
00069         std::stringstream date_time;
00070 
00071         date_time << DIGIT_FORMAT(2) << local_tm->tm_year - 100 << "-"
00072                         << DIGIT_FORMAT(2) << local_tm->tm_mon + 1 << "-"
00073                         << DIGIT_FORMAT(2) << local_tm->tm_mday << " " << DIGIT_FORMAT(2)
00074                         << local_tm->tm_hour << ":" << DIGIT_FORMAT(2) << local_tm->tm_min
00075                         << ":" << DIGIT_FORMAT(2) << local_tm->tm_sec << "."
00076                         << DIGIT_FORMAT(3) << (uint32_t) time.tv_usec / 1000;
00077         return date_time.str();
00078 }
00079 
00080 std::string Logger::pid(int32_t pid, int32_t tid) {
00081         std::stringstream stream;
00082         stream << STR_FORMAT(5) << pid << ":" << STR_FORMAT(5) << tid;
00083         return stream.str();
00084 }
